casebody.data:
In re C.D.A.W. No. 110A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 12, 2006. Gary C. Rhodes, Salisbury, for Angela Wright Eagle. Joyce Terres, Attorney Advocate, for Guardian At Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2006 by Petitioner (Guilford County DSS) for Extension of Time to File New Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Guilford County DSS) shall have up to and including the 24th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of July 2006."
